name: Animal Hunt (khailabs)
description:
#BrackeysGameJam https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-5

You are a lion. You are hungry. You need to hunt.
Remember, Stronger Together. Divide them, then hunt!

Sorry, it's only five levels and no dedicated scene to end the game T_T. 

If you like this game, come play our games on Android here

https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=5675411739335841674&hl=en&gl=US
